Posts.Content: Taskany wrote: I am 24.. Two weeks ago i started feeling sudden pain in my right breast. Everyday when i wake up in the morning or sit up after laying down i suffer terrible pain in nerves which lasts for about 5-6 seconds and then its gone.. sometimes i also felt constant pain. I went to doctor and he said its fibroadenosis. He suggested taking Mecgla capsule. Sometimes i feel the pain is fading away for a day or two but it starts all ober again. I dnt know what's wrong. I go to work by car. And i feel very scared when the car jolts.. I have heard that fibroadenosis is incurable.. I am scared.. Is it fibroadenosis or something else.. I havent done ultrasound yet.. can anyone help?! I am really worried Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fibroadenosis concern Taskany MelissaDallas
